title: LinkedIn Job Scraper with Company URLs
description: Advanced LinkedIn job scraper that extracts comprehensive job data including company LinkedIn URLs with anti-detection features.

startUrls.title: LinkedIn Job Search URLs

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of job listings to extract (0 = unlimited)

slowMode.title: Slow Mode (Safer)

includeCompanyUrl.title: Include Company LinkedIn URL
